snippet: The world’s biggest smartphone maker is rolling out the fifth version of its Galaxy S smartphone, but it has received mixed reviews.

byline.original: By TOM SIMS and SU-HYUN LEE

lead_paragraph: The world’s biggest smartphone maker is rolling out the fifth version of its Galaxy S smartphone, but it has received mixed reviews.

headline.main: Samsung Electronics Hit by Earnings Decline as Smartphone Sales Slow
headline.print_headline: Samsung Electronics Hit by Earnings Decline as Smartphone Sales Slow
